name: HenTied
description:
Hi, We are Olock.
HenTied is our first games that isn't a mobile games. this games is about Henny a lone Hen that trying to survive in the midst of crazy rooster.

This game created in the first GDP (Game Developer Palembang) GameJam in 2015. Henny born from our symphaty for woman roles in the game world. We are trying to create a main character that is strong willed and feminine.

Right now, we are trying to remodeling HenTied to platformer escape type model game. hope you wait for it.

see you later at new HenTied :)
